New Records: Manny Machado tied the Padres' career home run record with 163 home runs, moving into a tie with Nate Colbert
Key Match Events: The Padres won 5-1 against the Giants, with Machado launching two home runs
Pre-Game Insights: Machado needed one more home run to pass Colbert and become the all-time leader
Post-Match Reflections: Machado said it's an honor to be part of history and that he's grateful to have done it in front of the home crowd
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres moved closer to ensuring postseason baseball in the East Village next month, and extended their lead for the top National League Wild Card spot to 1 1/2 games over the Diamondbacks
Others: Padres manager Mike Shildt said he's relieved that rookie phenom Jackson Merrill's X-rays were negative after he fouled a ball off his left knee
